### Number Types

`Python` has 3 types of numbers 

```{python}
type(1)
type(1.2)
type(1 + 2j)
```

### Arithmatic Operators


```{python}
10 + 3
10 - 3
10 * 3
10 ** 3
10 / 3 
10 // 3 # floor division
10 % 3 # modulus
```

### Augmented Assignment Operator


```{python}
x = 10
x = x + 3
x
```

Shorter version

```{python}
x = 10
x += 3
x
```

### Function with Numbers

```{python}
round(2.3)
abs(-2.3)
```

using [`math` module](https://docs.python.org/3/library/math.html)

```{python}
import math

math.ceil(2.3)
math.factorial(3)
```
